## InspectPoliciesRequest.scopeRegexp property

Only include policies with a scope matching the given regular expression.

**Signature:**

```typescript
scopeRegexp?: string | undefined;
```

## Remarks

Regular expressions must use the [RE2 syntax](https://golang.org/s/re2syntax)<!-- -->. Note that backreferences are not supported.
